title: Llyn Ar Bryn Falls
description: An epic journey across a future Britain. It is a world like ours, places still familiar yet made strange by passing of time. Three hundred years after a catastrophe that has brought mankind to the brink of extinction, living is simpler and more brutal. When trouble comes to their village, a group of travellers will set out across the land in search of a new home - but many adventures will stand in their way before they find it.
author: H.M. Reynolds
